articles.title: Bharat Biotech Submits Data On Covid-19 Vaccine Trial In Children - NDTV
articles.description: India is turning its focus towards vaccinating children against the coronavirus, having already administered more than 920 million doses to adults among its population of nearly 1.4 billion.
articles.content:
Bharat Biotech has submitted data from its Covid-19 vaccine trial in children.
